name: ocade-fusion-anythingllm-chatbot
description: WordPress plugin for AnythingLLM chatbot integration

scripts.build:js: terser assets/js/chatbot.js -c -m -o assets/js/chatbot.min.js && terser assets/js/admin.js -c -m -o assets/js/admin.min.js
scripts.build:css: cleancss -o assets/css/chatbot.min.css assets/css/chatbot.css && cleancss -o assets/css/admin.min.css assets/css/admin.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css

author: Ocade Fusion <contact@ocadefusion.fr>
